title: Dogma (Emigre)
content:
Hello has all,

I am new on this forum rich in information, however I do not have to find of answers to the questions that I settle(arise), that’s why I allows me to open a new subject.  
I am student in visual communication and within the framework of the lesson of typography we have to realize a book presenting a font. I take charge of Dogma drawn by Zuzana Licko.  
I do not manage to find examples of use of this typography.  
Have already crossed it in advertisements, visual identity, post ..... ?

please help me !
